items.sentence: Was Tom the one who told you you shouldn't do that?

Here's a list of things that you really need to do.

Do you know those women who just got off the train?
You shouldn't blame other people for your mistakes.
I can't accept the blame for how things turned out.
I wouldn't blame you if you didn't want to do that.
I'm looking forward to spending more time with you.

We're building a new factory not too far from here.

I hate it when my clothes smell of cigarette smoke.
